definition: Horace, full Latin name Quintus Horatius Flaccus (65-8 BC), Roman poet
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Want more? Read Horace Dediu's analysis at .
sentences.chinese: 欲知更多詳情，請點擊閱讀賀拉斯德迪歐的分析結果。

sentences.english: Hence "licking the honey" became my own Horatian motto.
sentences.chinese: 因此，“舔食蜂蜜”成爲了我的賀拉斯座右銘。
